author: Cody Clouser

review: Have Apple TV and love it but that didn't come with Amazon Prime app so decided to give this a try when we chose to expand our homes TV footprint with these kind of devices. Not too fond of the navigation vs Apple TV. Love the price vs Apple TV though I should say we got a door buster. I may have just stuck with Apple TV if Fire Stick was full price. Wifi connection to our router has already had connection errors. The devices are directly across the hall so it is not a signal issue. A simple reboot of Fire stick solved the problem. 2 weeks out of the box does make me a bit concerned. Remote is Bluetooth so works via proximity vs line of site. That has plus and minus. I wish I could set up my existing TV remote with it but that is not possible due to the standard TV remote not having Bluetooth capabilities. It is nice to not have to point at anything in order for it to work everytime. These remotes are smaller so in our house they seem to get lost much easier. Overall, a nice less expensive alternative to other options but still has lots of room to improve. Most likely, if I expand the TV footprint again with devises like this, I will go back to my trusted Apple TV product.
author: Tom Moriarty
